EmailTemplate.description: Email to follow-up with intro call.
EmailTemplate.name: Tamara J. Intro
EmailTemplate.subject: Hello from Tamara Jerome
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello from Tamara Jerome, your Univar Sales Specialist
<!--
-->
{!Contact.FirstName},
It was a pleasure speaking with you on the phone today. I'll be calling again in the coming weeks to ensure that Univar is providing you with all the products and services that you require.
If you have any current need or requirement you would like to discuss please feel free to contact me at your leisure. My office hours are 7:30-4:00.
I look forward to helping you make the process of acquiring ingredients easy and cost-efficient. Univar and I can show you how.
Tamara Jerome Food Specialist
(866) 406-4724
Tamara.Jerome@univarusa.com
To place an order: Call Rebeca Vargus
(323) 837-7029
Rebeca.Vargus@univarusa.com
Sincerely,
Univar | Los Angeles
2600 S Garfield Ave
Commerce, CA 90040
ChemCare
Univar USA
Food Ingredients
Online Ordering
